yeah the 0-days don't go back that far, but i think i can find it. i don't think romita wrote it, though. he may have plotted it but i see someone else credited as writer.

That would be great if you can find it.  yeah my memory was off, it looks like JRjr co-plotted it, not wrote it.  i remember a podcast interview he gave where he said it's one of his favorite projects ever and he thought it would make a good movie.

maybe someday he'll get it made for film or tv. if anyone deserves to get rich from a movie option, i'd say JRJR does.
